name: CLARITY (kainyame)
description:
You’re a student in art school with a big deadline coming up. However, your mind is plagued with artist’s block, and you can’t think of an idea for your next project. Team up with your friends - it’s up to your artistic sensibilities, represented by the three primary colors, to clear the black holes that are clogging the path to clarity in your mind to reach the idea that will cement your name among the greats in the art world.

--

Credits:

Using Photon Unity Networking SDK

Paper Rip Effect
